properties.areaDesc: Cleburne, AR; Conway, AR; Lonoke, AR; Independence, AR; White, AR; Perry, AR; Faulkner, AR; Saline, AR; Pulaski, AR; Garland, AR; Van Buren, AR
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 11 at 12:03AM CST until January 11 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Eastern Perry County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas...
Northwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
Faulkner County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Conway County in central Arkansas...
White County in central Arkansas...
East central Garland County in central Arkansas...
Saline County in central Arkansas...
Pulaski County in central Arkansas...

* Until 300 AM CST.

* At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms
producing torrential downpours across the warned area. One to two
inches of rain per hour is likely, with flash flooding in places.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Little Rock...                    North Little Rock...
Conway...                         Benton...
Sherwood...                       Jacksonville...
Cabot...                          Searcy...
West Little Rock...               Maumelle...
Bryant...                         Hot Springs Village...
Batesville...                     Downtown Little Rock...
Heber Springs...                  Lonoke...
Fairfield Bay...                  North Little Rock Airport...
Little Rock AFB...                Southwest Little Rock...
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:00 AM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
